mapper.select: Select student.studentNO, student.name, score.commonScore, score.finalScore, score.totalScore from student, score, studentCourseRelation where student.studentID = score.studentID AND student.studentID = studentCourseRelation.studentID AND studentCourseRelation.courseID = #{courseID} ORDER BY student.studentNO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO score (commonScore, finalScore, totalScore, studentID, teacherID) VALUES (#{commonScore}, #{finalScore}, #{totalScore}, #{studentID}, #{teacherID})
